level.heading: ADMINISTRATIVE SERVICES[COLON] MANAGEMENT AND ADMINISTRATION — RESEARCHTANDARDS (§ 29-2317)

level.text: All research development and related activities that involve human subjects shall comply with “Protection of Human Subjects” 45 C.F.R., Part 46 and “Confidentiality of Alcohol and Drug Abuse Patient Records” 42 C.F.R., Part 2.

The organization, facility or program shall comply with all applicable federal and District regulations to assure the protection of participants in human research and to ensure a written policy prohibiting participation in human research.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 47 DCR 9341 (November 24, 2000), adopting Emergency and Proposed Rulemaking published at 47 DCR 7708, 7725 (September 22, 2000).
